name: Castle Nomis
overview: Guide King Olof through the dungeon beneath the castle in search of evil prince Egnor in order to defeat him and regain the throne. Control is via the mouse. Selecting the appropriate icons in the border and using objects, fighting etc. in the main window. Clicking with the left mouse button on the directional arrows moves Olof in the appropriate direction (forward - walk forward, right - rotate right etc.) Also in the border is Olofs energy bar. The marker shows the energy, which goes down when Olof is hit. The compass next to the directional arrows shows the direction in which Olof is facing. The bottom row of icons are the action icons these are selected using the right Mouse button and cancelled using the left mouse button. The top row of icons are the item icons (these are empty to start with). As you collect items throughout the game their icons will appear in these boxes. These may also be selected and cancelled using the same method as the action icons. Published in Software 2000 Volume 1 SET 2 CD 2.
